statements: SELECT * FROM RealTimeDataMonitoring;
SELECT id, event_type FROM RealTimeDataMonitoring WHERE event_type = 'Error';
SELECT timestamp, event_description FROM RealTimeDataMonitoring ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM RealTimeDataMonitoring WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM RealTimeDataMonitoring WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-02 23:59:59';
SELECT id, timestamp, event_type, event_description, user_id FROM RealTimeDataMonitoring WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM RealTimeDataMonitoring WHERE event_type = 'Error' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-03-31 23:59:59';
SELECT id, event_type, user_id FROM RealTimeDataMonitoring WHERE timestamp > '2022-04-15' AND event_type LIKE '%Alert%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, event_description FROM RealTimeDataMonitoring WHERE event_description IS NOT NULL AND event_type IN ('Info', 'Warning') ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events, event_type FROM RealTimeDataMonitoring GROUP BY event_type HAVING total_events > 5 ORDER BY total_events DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 1;
SELECT alert_description FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM access_logs WHERE time_stamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_description FROM alerts WHERE alert_id < 3 ORDER BY alert_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts LIMIT 5;
SELECT alert_id, alert_description FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY time_stamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING log_count > 5;
SELECT MAX(log_id), MIN(log_id) FROM access_logs;
SELECT * FROM cloud_environment_monitoring;
SELECT id, server_name, timestamp FROM cloud_environment_monitoring ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT server_name, access_type FROM cloud_environment_monitoring WHERE access_type = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_access_alerts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT alert_id, user_id, permission_level FROM unauthorized_access_alerts ORDER BY alert_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_environment_monitoring WHERE id = 1;
SELECT server_name, timestamp FROM unauthorized_access_alerts WHERE permission_level = 'admin' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT server_name FROM cloud_environment_monitoring WHERE access_type = 'private';
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_access_alerts WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND permission_level = 'read';
SELECT server_name, anomaly_type FROM anomaly_detection_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM data_monitoring ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, event_type, event_description FROM data_monitoring WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' AND triggered_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY triggered_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, access_time, accessed_data FROM unauthorized_access WHERE user_id = 200 ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT anomaly_id, user_id, anomaly_type FROM anomalies WHERE detected_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM data_monitoring;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, event_description FROM data_monitoring WHERE event_type='error';
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_event_time FROM data_monitoring GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, alert_type, alert_description FROM alerts ORDER BY triggered_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, anomaly_type, detected_time FROM anomalies WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM unauthorized_access);
SELECT * FROM Users LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE last_login >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM Roles;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM Roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT email FROM Users WHERE username = 'john.doe'
SELECT * FROM Users ORDER BY last_login DESC
SELECT Users.username, Roles.role_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id
